aa.name: Brave
aa.desc: Acts fearlessly, even in dangerous situations.

ab.name: Cowardly
ab.desc: Avoids danger and conflict whenever possible.

ac.name: Loyal
ac.desc: Deeply committed to those they care about.

ad.name: Deceitful
ad.desc: Often lies or hides the truth for personal gain.

ae.name: Sarcastic
ae.desc: Frequently uses dry or mocking humor.

af.name: Ambitious
af.desc: Driven to achieve success, no matter the cost.

ag.name: Lazy
ag.desc: Avoids effort and responsibility when possible.

ah.name: Empathetic
ah.desc: Feels and understands the emotions of others.

ai.name: Hot-Tempered
ai.desc: Easily angered, quick to react emotionally.

aj.name: Curious
aj.desc: Always asking questions and exploring ideas.
